participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, nurturing, and passionate about art and music.
participant_1.background: I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together. I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close. I play jazz piano in a band. I run track for myself. I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I am not sure what I will be doing this weekend, but I plan to keep my blood sugar levels under control. My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world. I don’t like pickles. Since young I have loved fashion. I am going to stay home and relax this weekend.

content.text: Hey! I'm excited to meet you!
Hey there! I'm excited to meet you too!
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read and write, and I also enjoy running and playing the piano.
That's great! I also love to read and write, and I play piano too!
Oh nice! What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play jazz and blues. I also like to play classical music.
Awesome! I love jazz and blues too! I'm not so good at playing classical music, but I enjoy listening to it.
That's great! I think it's really important to have a creative outlet.
I agree! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go shopping and spend time with my family. I also love to travel.
That's great! I love to travel too! I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to travel to more.
Me too! I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to travel to more as well.
What are some of your favorite places to travel?
I really enjoyed my trip to Italy. I also loved my trip to Japan.
Those both sound amazing! I've always wanted to go to Italy.
It's a beautiful country! I'd love to go back someday.
I'm sure it would be amazing. I've heard great things about Japan too.
It's a really interesting country. I loved the food and the culture.
I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your trips!
